title: This is gettnig annoying rip ;_;
body: so today everytime i was in champ select, and it was going to finally start in game, it says "Sorry, we were unable to start your game." ive reinstalled the client and tried fixing everything and it still keeps onhappening and then it boots me back to the home screen and the game never starts, now i have low priority queue and basically cant play. oh and it ends in champ select so luckily no one is in game yet

replies.body:
Yeah I do see a few games here over the last 2 days where your team had to early surrender, I can definitely see that being annoying.  The game was successful in being created, but it sounds like your network had problems reaching the specific server.  

You may want to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this before playing anymore games after today.  I know you've played a few already without issues, but your connection will likely get worse soon.
